oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Note describing bovine horn snuff box
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This note was found inside a bovine horn snuff box. It says that the box was "traided to a Yank for coffee while we ware on Picket at the foot of lookout mountain in the year 1863 or four." [goes with item tsla004]
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
